title: 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<dyn Any>'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code Couldn't get minimal example. Error in large project and I couldn't isolate ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0-nightly (5b210643e 2021-10-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: 5b210643ebf2485aafdf2494de8cf41941a64e95 commit-date: 2021-10-11 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.57.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/5b210643ebf2485aafdf2494de8cf41941a64e95/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1092:9 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::span_bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::span_bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt 7: ::run_pass 8: rustc_mir_transform::run_passes 9: rustc_mir_transform::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 10: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 11: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 12: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 13: ::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 14: rustc_session::utils::::time 15: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 16: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 17: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 18: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 19: ::analysis 20: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 21: rustc_span::with_source_map 22: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
